extendedInfo.description: Description:In the middle of twenty-two century, the evil alien creatures invaded the Earth, and then they destroyed the whole planet by creating mighty monsters and obedient servants. Whatâs worse, they have occupied the 6 most vital areas where the flames of war raged across the land. At such critical moment, all you need to do is take up your arms with your duty and honor, travel through time and space, and ignite the battle with your blood!Gameplay:Tap and hold your phone screen to guide the shooting direction of your machine gun.Tap and hold the special skill icon at the lower left corner, and then drag it to the target which you want to attack after you get full Energy to release special skills.Tap the triangle icon below the guns to change weapons.Features:1. Various weapons, 10 kinds of guns! Enjoy yourself in the pleasure of headshots and strafe!2. Multiple game experiences. 3 survival skills, 3 combat skills, and 5 special skills allow you to make your enemies go to the hell!3. Plenty of battle stages: 6 areas, 6 classic maps, and 36 stages. You can travel through time and space!4. Many kinds of enemies: 18 enemies, and 9 unique alien creatures. Take up your arms and kill them!5. Intense fighting. Super combos that can be added unlimitedly will bring you lots of Golds! More bonus and honors are waiting for you!

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Its good
reviews.author: tan nguyen

reviews.title: Game resets progress
reviews.comment: Waste of time due to progress reset. Uninstalled it. Could have been a good game.
reviews.author: Mike Montano

reviews.title: Ads block part of the screen
reviews.comment: I shouldn\'t have to keep closing an ad in the middle of a wave multiple times.  This apps persistence has ensured that I will NEVER download Spotify.
reviews.author: Jeff Sanders

reviews.title: Very disappointed
reviews.comment: I think it will fun than zombie evil, but it awful than before.
reviews.author: Hak chengratheany

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Perfect action and fun. Just the right amount of challenge I wanted without making it too hard and I get frustrated! this is unknown gold on the market. and for free too; can\'t get much better than that!
reviews.author: Logan Lopez

reviews.title: WTF
reviews.comment: I gave this game a 5 star rating and I was loving the game but I got on today and everything gone I\'m back at square one I almost had the last gun and I havent even beaten it yet now I have to go through it all over again if my shyt isn\'t restored I\'m removing this game
reviews.author: Robert Keister

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Its an ok game, not bad but if you like this type of game, zombie evil is a 5 star game without a doubt. The only reason I give this game 2 stars is because of zombie evil.
reviews.author: Leslie Grant

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: The game is great but why it can\'t save..after i got to second level it will restart lvl 1 back..need to fix the bug..

reviews.title: Annoying ads, terrible sound quality, and a save game glitch.
reviews.comment: Title says it all. I was looking for a game similar to Defender 2 but with guns. This was it until my save game randomly got deleted.

reviews.comment: Bullshit, the game is resetting every now & then. Its a pain & time waste
